title: Add accessor functions to QueryResultsKey
description: We need to add accessor functions to QueryResultsKey. In our custom regenerator, we need to get the query, filter and sort data items. The only accessible object we have is the QueryResultsKey object. I then added accessor functions for SFields and NC_Flags even though I don't need them in order to complete the interface.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Cleaning up old JIRAs, re-open if necessary.
